name: Ext_R5_Observation_derivedFrom
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Observation.derivedFrom for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents Observation.derivedFrom from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Observation|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Related resource from which the observation is made
element.definition: The target resource that represents a measurement from which this observation value is derived. For example, a calculated anion gap or a fetal measurement based on an ultrasound image.
element.comment: `Observation.derivedFrom` maps to R4 `Observation.derivedFrom`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
